title: Number of members of FC Bayern Munich 2005 to 2018
summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of members in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of members in thousands 291.0 is found at Month Nov 2018 and the minimum is found at 2005/06 where Number of members in thousands is 121.12.
There is a difference of 169.88 between the maximum Month Nov 2018 and minimum Month 2005/06.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of members in thousands for 14 number of Months.
Month Nov 2018 has the highest Number of members in thousands and 2005/06 has the lowest Number of members in thousands.
The highest Month Nov 2018 has 169.88 more Number of members in thousands than the lowest Month 2005/06.
Number of members in thousands at Month Nov 2018 is 291.0 , second place is  at 291.0, and thirdly is 2016/17 at 284.04.
